title: Reject due to lack of sufficient evaluation
review:
Pros:
1) Some of the simplifications might be useful.
2) The MR algorithm sounds interesting.
Cons: 
1) The acknowledgement section was left in the review draft, violating anonymous review.
2) Results do not seem particularly compelling (presented on just one task, and unclear how it generalizes to other tasks).
3) Some of the justifications seem a bit strange. For eg, quoting from the paper: "Why this assumption? Because it can't be otherwise"
confidence: 1: The reviewer's evaluation is an educated guess
